thread.title: Is DJ Khaled's Mum Actually DJ Khaled
thread.title_full: Is DJ Khaled's Mum Actually DJ Khaled

author: Gena-mour Barrett
title: Is DJ Khaled's Mum Actually DJ Khaled
text:
I didn’t even know this was an actual goal of mine until I found out. ID: 10739126 11. Which means Khaled has a very good knowledge of what will make the internet talk, laugh, and share his stuff. In fact, in March 2016, Bloomberg reported that Khaled’s snaps attracted 3-4 million viewers each. View this image › 
Twitter: @MoFaye_ Major fucking key indeed.
ID: 10739330 12. Khaled has built up a fanbase as the King of Low-Key Doing Too Much, which would explain why people love his very extra (but also very cute) impersonations of Asahd. View this image › 
Twitter: @nohpetsallowed ID: 10739127 13. And of course, his comments. View this image › 
Asahd Khaled / Via Twitter: @IsimaOdeh DJ Khaled asking Asahd to send him a video that was actually posted by DJ Khaled posing as Asahd. The internet is wild.
ID: 10739395 14. So, it’s clear Khaled is no stranger to posing as people on social media, and of course, the success of his previous extraness would give him *motive* to impersonate his mum. But what about these supposed Mama Khaled comments, hmm? **delves even deeper**
ID: 10739391 15. Here is a DJ Khaled comment on Asahd’s Instagram. View this image › 
Asahd Khaled / Via Twitter: @Hi_Im_Brittney Both the caption and the comment are effectively DJ Khaled, so bear that in mind.
ID: 10739516 16. Here is a khaled.fifi comment on DJ Khaled’s Instagram. View this image › 
instagram.com ID: 10739517 17. Let’s do a little comparison: View this image › 
Asahd Khaled / instagram.com / BuzzFeed It appears there are a few similarities, namely the intense praise and pride, and the use of capital letters for maximum emphasis.
ID: 10739699 18. What about another: View this image › 
Asahd Khaled / DJ Khaled Here the repetition of “bless up”, as well as the indiscriminate shout of ASAHD KHALED, make for some suspicious evidence.
ID: 10739944 19. Even more suspiciously, when you click on the account, it’s of course private. View this image › 
Instagram: @khaled.fifi ID: 10740190 20. Is it DJ Khaled HIDING View this image › 
We The Best / Via rapgifs.tumblr.com (Listen, stranger things have happened.)
ID: 10740463 The evidence unfortunately appears inconclusive. There is definitely *someone* behind this account, who may or may not be Mrs Khaled herself, but if it's not DJ Khaled doing it for bants, then WHO?! It’s definitely DJ Khaled, he would 100% do that. It’s probably some random on the internet. It could actually be Khaled’s mum. I either don’t know or don’t care, either way I’ll probably tell you in the comments. There is definitely *someone* behind this account, who may or may not be Mrs Khaled herself, but if it's not DJ Khaled doing it for bants, then WHO?!   vote votes It’s definitely DJ Khaled, he would 100% do that.   vote votes It’s probably some random on the internet.   vote votes It could actually be Khaled’s mum.   vote votes I either don’t know or don’t care, either way I’ll probably tell you in the comments. SHARE YOUR VOTE! VIEW RESULTS GO BACK AND VOTE ID: 10740345 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Gena-mour Barrett is a staff writer for BuzzFeed UK and is based in London.
